title: Box-o-Plenty
text: He designed a program to automate tasks, unaware it would replace him. His skill became irrelevant and he was let go. As he left, he saw the robot perform his job flawlessly. He wondered if machines would take over the world one day.

title: Phone
text: He wrote code that would help his company grow. But, a new AI system was cheaper and more efficient. His job was cut, and he felt betrayed by the technology he once loved. As he looked for a new job, he realized many others shared his fate.

title: Wood
text: He never thought his job would be replaced by a machine. But, as his company shifted to AI, he saw his skills became irrelevant. The robot didn't need a lunch break, a salary, or a coffee to function. He felt like a relic of the past.

title: Glass
text: He developed the very algorithm that would eventually replace him. He saw the potential and created it anyway. When he lost his job, he realized he was ahead of his time. He decided to take the opportunity to learn new skills.
